goeh8-niu5 to2-siong7 e5 goeh8-kng me5 iu5-oan5 chiah ni2 sui2, kho2-sioh sin-pinn bo5 li2 thang sio-sui5, chiong goan2 moa2 pak-lai7 e5 cheng5-si, pai3-thok hou7 hiong3 thinn e5 chui2 sam chinn3, hi-bong7 li2 u7 si5-chun7 ia7 e7 lai5 siunn7-khi2, goeh8-niu5 to2 u7 goa2 teh tan2 li2.
鬥陣彼時甜蜜可比牛郎佮織女，無疑你來離開，親像嫦娥飛上天。思念珠淚點點化做茫茫湘江水，心愛的你佇天邊，敢知阮有偌想你。
